div.p: This value set expansion contains 2 concepts.

td.a: First hepatitis A dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-108

tr.td: First hepatitis A dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis A-containing vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SHepatitisALiveAttenuatedHAV1Dose for IMMZ.D18.S.Hepatitis A.Live attenuated HAV 1-dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis A vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Live attenuated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1 dose schedule

code.value: First hepatitis A dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-108

display.value: First hepatitis A dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed
